content: Stepped drill bit TS-BT 5.3-95 S ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - - ### FEATURES:Features TS-BT step drill bit – simplifies the task of drilling pilot holes to the correct depth for screw-in threaded studs TS-BT HC step drill bit – efficiently removes steel coatings around the pre-drilled hole for S-BT high-current screw-in threaded studs Applications Drilling pilot holes when fastening S-BT threaded studs for steel Removing coatings when fastening S-BT high-current threaded studs for steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Metal Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 6 mm Length: 95 mm Technical Data | Base materials | Metal | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 6 mm | Length | 95 mm ### ITEMS- 2346084 - Stepped drill bit TS-BT 5.3-95 S - Package Size 1 pc
